text:
Remember how we used XDoclet to create documentation? How about we switch to
Java5 tags, with the same backport library that TestNG uses to support javadoc
tags in older source?
creator: stevel@apache.org
jan@materne.de
text:
Java compliance level is now Java5, so we could use annotations.
But I think we could close this
- issue is very old and noone seems to be interested in
- lot of work faced with unknown benefit
